2025-0512
2025-06-13FINFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements ActOrder Approving the Entering into Agreements to Amend the Tax Collection Agreement with Certain Provinces and Territories Order approving that the Minister of Finance, on behalf of the Government of Canada, enter into agreements to amend the TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENTS with the government of each of Ontario, New Brunswick, British Columbia, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador and Nunavut.N/A
subject: Order Approving the Entering into Agreements to Amend the Tax Collection Agreement with Certain Provinces and Territories
precis: Order approving that the Minister of Finance, on behalf of the Government of Canada, enter into agreements to amend the TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENTS with the government of each of Ontario, New Brunswick, British Columbia, Prince Edward Island, Newfoundland and Labrador and Nunavut.
